summary: Web colors are used to display pages on the internet. They can be described using RGB (red, green, blue) values, hexadecimal codes, or common names. Each color is made up of different amounts of red, green, and blue light, with each component having 256 possible values (0-255). This allows for over 16 million possible colors. Some colors can even go beyond this range. Web colors have a specific definition called sRGB, which helps ensure they look consistent across different devices and platforms.
title: Web colors
